festival
========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which festival installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using festival, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load festival/2.5.0-GCCcore-9.3.0
```
